title: EP - 59 - BONUS EPISODE: SECRETS FROM JON AND KATE PLUS 8 AND PRINCES OF MALIBU
description:
Brant Pinvidic is an award winning film director, veteran television producer, and the founder and CEO of Envelop Entertainment. In this interview he discusses how he put Jon and Kate Plus 8 on the air, production of Princes of Malibu, and the reality tv landscape today. Tall Tales podcast host Jason Stewart reviews Meet the Putnams on TLC. Rebecca Lavoie is the podcast producer and host behind Crime Writers On…, These Are Their Stories: The Law & Order Podcast, and the forthcoming HGTV & Me podcast.  Kate asks her to review Scientology The Aftermath on A&E. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
